reference.title: JSON object for entitlement resource ID

refsyn.p: The following code block provides an example of a JSON object when the entitlement resource ID is a simple text string. In this case, the resource ID is the string "resource".
The following code block provides an example of a JSON object when the entitlement resource ID is an HTML-encoded mRSS string.
The following mRSS string is used as the resource id.
